title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 4216/88 of 21 December 1988 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3611/84 fixing the conversion factors for frozen squid
header:
Commission regulation (EEC) No 4216/88
of 21 December 1988
amending Regulation (EEC) No 3611/84 fixing the conversion factors for frozen squid
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3611/84 is replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1989.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 December 1988.
For the Commission
António Cardoso E Cunha
Member of the Commission
[1] OJ No L 379, 31. 12. 1981, p. 1.
[2] OJ No L 305, 10. 11. 1988, p. 1.
[3] OJ No L 333, 21. 12. 1984, p. 41.
[4] OJ No L 373, 31. 12. 1987, p. 6.
--------------------------------------------------
ANNEX
"ANNEX
I. Conversion factors for different species and presentations of frozen squid falling within CN code 0307:
Species | CN code | Presentation | Conversion factors |
(a)Squid Loligo spp. | | | |
Loligo patagonica | ex03074939 | Whole, not cleaned | 1,00 |
| | Cleaned | 1,20 |
Loligo vulgaris | 03074931 | Whole, not cleaned | 2,00 |
| | Cleaned | 2,40 |
Loligo pealei | 03074933 | Whole, not cleaned | 1,20 |
| | Cleaned | 1,40 |
Other species of the genus Loligo | ex03074939 | Whole, not cleaned | 1,10 |
| | Cleaned | 1,30 |
(b)Squid Ommastrephes sagittatus | | | |
Ommastrephes sagittatus | 03074951 | Whole, not cleaned | 1,00 |
| | Tube | 1,90 |
| | Cylinder | 2,85 |
(c)Squid Illex spp.: | | | |
Illex illecebrosus | ex03079911 | Whole, not cleaned | 1,00 |
| | Tube | 1,90 |
| | Cylinder | 2,85 |
Illex argentinus | ex03079911 | Whole, not cleaned | 1,00 |
| | Tube | 1,90 |
| | Cylinder | 2,85 |
Other species of the genus Illex | ex03079911 | Whole, not cleaned | 1,00 |
| | Tube | 1,90 |
| | Cylinder | 2,85 |
II. Forms of commercial presentation :
whole, not cleaned: | completely unprocessed ; |
cleaned: | product has at least been gutted ; |
tube: | body of the squid, at least gutted and headed; |
cylinder: | tube without skin and without wings." |
